titles.title: To provide private relief for Salah Idris of Saudi Arabia and El Shifa Pharmaceuticals Industries Company relating to the bombing and destruction of the El Shifa Pharmaceutical plant in Khartoum, Sudan, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 9/25/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to Salah Idris of Saudi Arabia and to El Shifa Pharmaceuticals Industries Company a specified amount in full settlement of their claims arising from the bombing and destruction of the El Shifa Pharmaceutical plant in Khartoum, Sudan, by U.S. armed forces on August 20, 1998.
